definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: He and his family had been living in a refugee camp in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 他和家人此前一直生活在肯尼亞一個難民營中。

sentences.english: A sandstorm in a refugee camp near the border of Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 一場沙塵暴席捲了索馬里邊境附近的一個難民營。

sentences.english: Measles cases seem to be everywhere in the camps, too.
sentences.chinese: 貌似在難民營裏麻診病患也是隨處可見。

sentences.english: She will travel to the Thai-Burmese border to visit a refugee center, and a clinic.
sentences.chinese: 她將前往泰緬邊界，參觀一個難民營和一個診所。

sentences.english: The author portrays life in a refugee camp very vividly.
sentences.chinese: 作者生動地描述了難民營中的生活。

sentences.english: I met Benti, a mother of three who lives in a large camp.
sentences.chinese: 本蒂，三個孩子的母親，住在一個大難民營。

sentences.english: In Dollo, the refugee officials found camps filling up quickly.
sentences.chinese: 在多洛，難民事務官員發現難民營入住的速度很快。

sentences.english: A cow is ritually slaughtered outside the Kalma refugee camp.
sentences.chinese: 一頭牛在難民營外被宰殺。

sentences.english: Construction of Ifo II camp began shortly after.
sentences.chinese: 之後，IFo二號難民營開始興建。

sentences.english: A group of teenagers go to a school camp in the Blue Mountains in Australia .
sentences.chinese: 組的青少年前往難民營的一所學校的藍山在澳大利亞。

sentences.english: Almost all the refugee camps have closed, and their residents returned home.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有的難民營都關閉，難民們重返家園。

sentences.english: When it photographed the same field yesterday, a refugee camp had already sprung up on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 昨天當它故地重遊時，草地已經變成了一個難民營。

sentences.english: The blue is refugee camps these volunteers had spotted from the air.
sentences.chinese: 藍色的是那些自願者從空中發現的難民營。

sentences.english: She is recovering at a refugee centre in Romania.
sentences.chinese: 她目前棲身於羅馬尼亞的一處難民營。

sentences.english: Tthe kidnapping has raised concerns about security in the sprawling camps.
sentences.chinese: 綁架事件增加了人們對這個混亂的難民營安全的擔心。

sentences.english: In the camps, more latrines must be built, as well as hand-washing stations at the latrines.
sentences.chinese: 在難民營區，必須多建便坑，還要在便坑搭設洗手檯。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
